channel.title: People keep dcing @ log in & few more quikies
channel.description:
It dcd me like 10times before it let me use it and now it works fine but when people try to log in it dc's them and you know how they just say f it and move on to the next server, so i want to know whats causing this problem, also when this happens and they stop trying to log in it dc's me as well [URL=http://img829.imageshack.us/i/92037259.png/][IMG]http://img829.imageshack.us/img829/6549/92037259.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL] ~~~~ also how do i make myself a donator i cant seem to find it in my char file
also how do i make items not just for donors since the sorce has all dclaws and d plates for donors only,
where can i make something like server anoucnements like the server just says "vote link"
and how do i make the shops to stop shouting and remove some of them/ some items
